content.webTitle: Guardian writers' predictions for the new season

fields.headline: Guardian writers' predictions for the new season
fields.bodyText: Kevin McCarra Premiership 1 Chelsea 2 Arsenal 3 Manchester United 4 Liverpool 5 Newcastle United Relegated 18 Everton 19 Norwich 20 Crystal Palace FA Cup Manchester United Carling Cup Newcastle United Champions League Milan Richard Williams Premiership 1 Arsenal 2 Liverpool 3 Chelsea 4 Man United 5 Aston Villa Relegated 18 Norwich City 19 Crystal Palace 20 Everton FA Cup Chelsea Carling Cup Birmingham City Champions League Milan Gordon Strachan Premiership 1 Manchester United 2 Arsenal 3 Chelsea 4 Liverpool 5 Newcastle Relegated 18 (any one from eight) 19 Norwich City 20 Crystal Palace FA Cup Chelsea Carling Cup Charlton Champions League Real Madrid Michael Walker Premiership 1 Arsenal 2 Chelsea 3 Liverpool 4 Manchester United 5 Middlesbrough Relegated 18 Crystal Palace 19 Portsmouth 20 Everton FA Cup Arsenal Carling Cup Charlton Champions League Barcelona Jon Brodkin Premiership 1 Chelsea 2 Arsenal 3 Man United 4 Liverpool 5 Newcastle Relegated 18 Everton 19 Norwich City 20 Crystal Palace FA Cup Arsenal Carling Cup Birmingham City Champions League Real Madrid Dominic Fifield Premiership 1 Arsenal 2 Chelsea 3 Manchester United 4 Liverpool 5 Newcastle United Relegated 18 Portsmouth 19 West Bromwich 20 Norwich City FA Cup Liverpool Carling Cup Aston Villa Champions League Milan Daniel Taylor Premiership 1 Arsenal 2 Chelsea 3 Man United 4 Liverpool 5 Newcastle Relegated 18 Everton 19 Norwich 20 West Bromwich FA Cup Liverpool Carling Cup Aston Villa Champions League Real Madrid Matt Scott Premiership 1 Manchester United 2 Arsenal 3 Chelsea 4 Liverpool 5 Newcastle Relegated 18 Manchester City 19 Norwich City 20 Crystal Palace FA Cup Middlesbrough Carling Cup Birmingham Champions League R Madrid
